items.name: Jordi Estiarte
items.content: We chose Vocdoni's technology because we believe it is the future of what real elections of any kind should be. Electronic voting is open to everyone and facilitates the process for the citizenry.

items.name: Ton Barnils
items.content: We chose Vocdoni because it guarantees safe, reliable, and transparent participation for all our members at the annual general assembly.

items.name: Anna Giralt
items.content: The commitment to Vocdoni has been clear, as at Òmnium Cultural we bet on a secure and verifiable voting system that would allow us to hold our statutory assemblies with all guarantees for the more than 180,000 members who are part of the entity.

items.name: Oscar Tirivò
items.content: Vocdoni provides us with an easy, secure, anonymous, and scalable voting system, completely integrated into our institutional environment. We will continue to trust it, without a doubt!

footer.mission: Vocdoni provides the world's most secure and accessible digital voting technology. Our mission is to enable organizations of any size to make collective decisions with full integrity.
footer.rights: All rights reserved. Secure digital voting for everyone.
